name: Agent Skills Guide
description: Comprehensive guide for creating, validating, and publishing Agent Skills following the agentskills.io open standard

name: Skill Reviewer
description: Validate individual skills for Agent Skills specification compliance. Use for quality assurance and batch validation of skill libraries.

name: Chain-of-Density Summarizer
description: Iteratively compress text using 5-turn chain-of-density summarization. Use for refactoring verbose skills to terse format or creating executive summaries.
